to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.impl

Class RemoteCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.impl.RemoteCommunication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, IRemoteCommunication

    public class RemoteCommunication
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRemoteCommunication
    This class handles the communication with the other Android device (Host or Client). It serialize the message to send into JSON and deserialize the received messages.
    Author:
    sven

      • startMessageListener

        public void startMessageListener()
        Start the Thread that wait for messages from the Host/Client.
        Specified by:

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the connection to the partner and if the message listener Thread is running, it will be stopped, too. The IRemoteCommunicationListener.connectionProblem(java.lang.Exception) callback will not executed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface IRemoteCommunication
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
